choices.C: From the Exchange admin center in Exchange Online, modify the spam filter policy.
choices.A: From the Security & Compliance admin center, modify the safe attachments policy.
choices.B: From the Exchange admin center in Exchange Online, modify the antimalware policy.
choices.D: From the Security & Compliance admin center, create a supervision policy.

questions.question_text:
You need to recommend a solution that meets the security requirements for protecting users.
What should you recommend?

choices.C: From the Security & Compliance admin center, create an ATP anti-phishing policy.
choices.B: From the Security & Compliance admin center, create an ATP Safe Links policy.
choices.D: From the Exchange admin center in Exchange Online, create a spam filter policy.
choices.A: From the Security & Compliance admin center, create an ATP safe attachments policy.

questions.question_text:
You need to configure the Exchange organization to meet the security requirements for sending email messages to distribution groups.
Which cmdlet should you run?

discussion.content: I think the given Answer "D" is correct. Set-OrganizationConfig has -MailTipsLargeAudienceThreshold option

Here we go boys and girls:
You use the Set-OrganizationConfig cmdlet to configure the large audience size for your organization. When the sender adds a distribution group that has more members than the configured large audience size, they are shown the Large Audience MailTip. The large audience size is set to 25 by default. This example configures the large audience size to 50 in your organization.
Set-OrganizationConfig -MailTipsLargeAudienceThreshold 50

Answer is corret: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/exchange/clients-and-mobile-in-exchange-online/mailtips/configure-large-audience-size

"You use the Set-OrganizationConfig cmdlet to configure the large audience size for your organization. When the sender adds a distribution group that has more members than the configured large audience size, they are shown the Large Audience MailTip. The large audience size is set to 25 by default"
I think the answer should be B. There is no option in Set-Organizationconfig to set a tip.
